summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6741 for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Plat of Sunrise Heights, being the alley between 31st Avenue Southwest and 30th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Othello Street to Southwest Myrtle Street, by paving, etc., and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
